description: Episode of Series "Psychology for Living". Aims to assist adolescents in understanding and controlling their emotions. Tells of an eighteen-year-old girl, faced with a decision involving her feelings for her parents and a young man. She recalls episodes from her early life in which love, fear and hate were not always controlled and is then able to make a decision that shows her emotional growth.
